name: Galaxy Attack (Spherikz)
description:
When you travel to a new galaxy, a whole new specie take your presence as a threat. And now they have targeted you. Survive as long as you can, shooting the aliens in space pods, before your fellow Earthly beings save you (which doesn't happen btw)

Created by a 16 year old.

Note: This is my first game jam, so it may not be the best.
